thread.title: Nice size rooms with great views
thread.title_full: Nice size rooms with great views - Review of Comfort Inn Manhattan Bridge, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Cayrocker
title: Nice size rooms with great views
text: This hotel is in a convenient location and great rates. It is in Chinatown, rightby Little Italy and we walked to the Bowery Ballroom. The rooms are good size and the bathroom in our room is very nice. Everything we needed at a good price for NYC!
